Authors: Nebojsa Lukic, Eleonora ÄŒapelja, Maja Karaman
Title: Tricholoma punctatum, new species to Europe
Abstract:
A new species of European Tricholoma recorded from
temperate forest in Serbia is described and illustrated. Its
characterized with presence of the punctate, often elevated, almost
black areas placed in one to three circular zones on the cap. Described
species showed morphological distinction from closely related taxa and
molecular phylogenetic analysis of ITS and LSU regions confirm its
novelty.
